title: why is Regular Gas so much cheaper down by Monkey Junction then further up College Rd and Oleander areas. Same Gas Companies ie: Hess, Exxon, Go Gas, 10 to 15 cents cheaper?
text:
Gas prices can vary from station to station. They charge what they think the market can bear:

http://www.myreporter.com/2009/08/why-are-gas-prices-different-in-different-parts-of-the-area-is-it-price-gouging/
